intro: Build, track, enjoy - be the conductor of your tiny toy world!
description:
Remember turning the living room into your own railway kingdom?

Experience a bit of that magic with Teeny Tiny Trains - Build tracks, flip switches, and dodge playful obstacles to guide your trains home.

Features:
- A cozy, diorama-style ambiance inspired by childhood spaces
- Thoughtful puzzles with relaxing vibes – no timers, just fun
- Unlockable toy trains to collect
- A retro-style arcade cabinet in-game with train-themed mini-games
